lyrics:
3 contributorsforever lyricsintro
baby i have something that i want to ask you baby
so sit back and listen

verse 1
hey miss beloved we are gathered here
to join each other hand and hand
no more playing house no
cause i want to make it real do you understand
to have and to hold mmmhmm until death do us part
no one no one could ever interrupt the beats of our heart
cause this is gonna last

chorus
forever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever
this is gonna last forever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever

verse 2
now theres no one here to speak out
and interrupt this ceremony ah baby yeah baby just say
all you got to do is say you love me
say that you love me and we will walk
and we will walk down the aisle watching the people smile
flowers are everywhere nothing else can compare
yeah girl you got the kind of love that makes a man like me
want to settle down a picket fence and a house yeah
you might also likechorus
forever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever
forever and ever and ever and ever and ever and ever

bridge
girl im down on my knees
so whats it gonna be whats it gonna be whats it gonna be
talk to me baby whats it gonna be whats it gonna be whats it gonna be
2 words yeah whats it gonna be whats gonna be
baby you and me baby you and me baby you and me
and its you and me baby you and me
oh oh oh oh ohohohohohohohohoh

outro over chorus
forever baby you and me baby
i will be your man you will be my lady
well walk hand in hand side by side
i will be the perfect groom you the perfect bride
would you just think about it baby think about it baby
you and me will be together girl
rain sleet snow no matter what the weather
just think about it baby think about it girl
well be making love for eternity raise a family girl
im on my knees saying marry me marry me
marry me cause i love you baby
marry me theres no other baby
marry me for you baby
marry me said a picket fence
marry me a dog and a house
marry me about 12 kids
you cooking me breakfast in the morning and im taking the garbage out marry me
marry me marry me marry me marry me hey marry me marry me marry me marry me
oh oh ohembed
